jops.meta
Class FlacMetadataReader

java.lang.Object
  jops.meta.FileMetadataReader
      jops.meta.FlacMetadataReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
MetadataReader, org.kc7bfi.jflac.FrameListener
public class FlacMetadataReader
extends FileMetadataReader
implements MetadataReader, org.kc7bfi.jflac.FrameListener

A reader for FLAC metadata. Based on JFLAC sample code.

Author:
Matt Windsor

processFrame

public void processFrame(org.kc7bfi.jflac.frame.Frame frame)
Stub for frame processing. This serves to halt the decoder once it reaches actual FLAC frames (which we assume to be stored after all Vorbis comments).

Specified by:
processFrame in interface org.kc7bfi.jflac.FrameListener
Parameters:
frame - The frame to (not) process.

processMetadata

public void processMetadata(org.kc7bfi.jflac.metadata.Metadata metadata)
Process the FLAC metadata, extracting artist, album and title information if available.

Specified by:

Parameters:
metadata - A metadata block.
